title: FS: Bill Heitman "The Monster" 1980 Original 32 Page Booklet JUST $18 EACH!!!
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: FS: Bill Heitman "The Monster" 1980 Original 32 Page Booklet JUST $18 EACH!!!
posts.post_content:
While supplies last...

These are in mint condition and are the original 1980 printing...and are almost never seen for sale anywhere...often selling for $20 or more on the rare occasions that they do show up.

Get a copy now or upgrade your current copy to one that is in pristine condition. 

Includes a massive amount of research done by hobby pioneer Bill Heitman including back checklists. 32 pages on everything that was known about "The Monster" as of 1980. 

This is a landmark publication that should be a part of every T206 collector's library.


Price includes shipping.

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/2016/heitman1_zpstykqwck5.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/2016/heitman2_zpsffhfkszp.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/2016/heitman3_zpsdcjcqciw.jpg[/IMG]

I believe that all PM's have been responded to. If I have not responded to anyone please let me know.

Plenty more available if anyone else wants one or wants to upgrade the one that they have.

Tom C

To all who have ordered, I will be shipping the booklets today. So sorry for the delay.

For anyone else who might be interested, I have quite a few more available.

Tom C

Bump for anyone who might want an original copy of this groundbreaking booklet. 

Tom C
Multiple vintage new old stock copies available. Quantity discounts as well. Great item for a dealer with a table at shows.
